sense.def:
Evidence
so stvari, ki jih vidimo, doživimo ali nam zanje povedo drugi in zaradi katerih verjamemo, da je nekaj res.

seg.quote: We saw evidence everywhere that a real effort was being made to promote tourism.
There was no evidence of quarrels between them.

sense.def:
To give evidence in a court of law
pomeni na sodišču povedati tisto, kar o nečem vemo.

Če je nekdo ali nekaj
in evidence
, je navzoč in ga lahko jasno vidimo.

seg.quote: Violence was particularly in evidence in the towns.
